# Sheltered Vitality (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 188

*Pressing your hand to the creatureâ€™s chest, you utter a low chant, and a warm glow passes from your hand into the subject.*

The subject gains immunity to fatigue, exhaustion, and ability damage or ability drain (regardless of the source).
